Revamped the scheduled product experience to serve the airport use case, resulting in 2X% year-over-year growth in scheduled airport rides.

Resulted in improved user adoption and optimized financial outcomes.
Managed Norton Lifelock subscription pricing for user acquisition and retention in Asia Pacific regions.
Designed and implemented price tests in Japan, improving conversion rate by 10%.
Streamlined the pricing change workflow, reducing lead time by 30%.
Developed a real-time, dynamic sales pipeline dashboard for the Head of Sales.
Enhanced visibility into key metrics and improved forecast accuracy.
Segmented conversion rates and revenue probabilities by sales pipeline stage.
Provided audit services to clients in technology, retail, and manufacturing industries.
Enhanced client trust and satisfaction through detailed financial analysis.
Used Excel and SQL for detailed financial analysis.
